layerItems.description:
OpenEmbedded-Core is a layer containing the core metadata for current versions
of OpenEmbedded. It is distro-less (can build a functional image with
DISTRO = "nodistro") and contains only emulated machine support.
layerItems.name: openembedded-core

layerItems.description:
This layer provides support for Freescale's platforms for use with
OpenEmbedded and/or Yocto.
layerItems.name: meta-freescale
layerItems.summary: This layer provides support for Freescale's platforms for use with OpenEmbedded and/or Yocto.
